message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.NA. 

The paper deals with representing images and videos using SPD matrices and considering the Riemannian geometry of the resulting space. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The paper also introduces an approach that involves optimization on a Grassmann manifold, which is a topic in numerical analysis (cs.NA). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of affinity-weighted similarity measures, which is a common technique in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and multimedia (cs.MM) research.
